title: #lol-oce - A Spam-Free Future | Our own Internet Relay Chat
body:
Hey guys so since Riot decided to remove the publicly listed chat rooms I thought I would create a new one on freenode where we can all continue on as a community. 

I am looking for volunteer staffers who will be selected from trusted players.

All Rioters will be auto staffed at their request (Leave your IRC nick name here)

Anyway you can join Via any IRC client or through the link I provided above.

Stay and chat, we don't have an ontopic rule but the topic is obviously League Of Legends.

We wont tolerate advertising spam or racial abuse. 

Stay safe and enjoy.
-PS: Any questions about how to join or anything else leave them here and ill get back ASAP.

replies.body: You can still join the public chatrooms, you just have to type the names into the search bar.
I just find this nicer because their is no room limit and moderation can be much more active.
